titles.title: All Praise To Our Redeeming Lord (easy familia

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All praise to our redeeming Lord Who joins us by His grace And bids us each to each restored Together seek His face Together seek His face{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He bids us build each other up And gathered into one To our high calling's glorious hope We hand in hand go on We hand in hand go on{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The gift which He on one bestows We all delight to prove The grace through every vessel flows In purest streams of love In purest streams of love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We all partake the joy of one The common peace we feel A peace to worldly minds unknown A joy unspeakable A joy unspeakable{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And if our fellowship below In Jesus be so sweet What height of rapture shall we know When 'round His throne we meet When 'round His throne we meet{/lang-eng}
